<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_ncsovit9NG1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/NimK4pFG7eg" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Everyone wants to rule the world, indeed. Simiel Black takes a peek into the future and offers up his interpretation of a KSP 1.0 trailer might look like in this week’s featured video.</p>
my first thought was oh my god they're confirming the update to unity 5. then I saw the video, wasn't disappointed.
That was awesome! Although I think it could have focused on space a little more.

Nice cinematic, I quite enjoyed it! But what does it have to do with version 1.0 of KSP? I don't see any changes from the current version, in video editing or anything. But just taking it as a cinematic, I loved it.

Sweet,....

so what specs do we need for that?

Oh is that flag moving in a nice sea breeze on Kerbin?
Simply amazing video! And excellent choice of music to go with it, too.
Video is not available for me, living in germany :-/
Video is not available, thanks....
Personally I think this video is way to dark. I think more part should have been recorded during day cycle.
No video for me. Can you upload it somewhere else?
Proxtube is your illegal friend...

The video contains any kind of music at all, which I think makes it blocked-by-default in Germany.

Frankly I'm surprised YouTube hasn't pulled it in the US yet, considering it has music owned by a major label.

Good song, though, and very well-made video.

Proxtube is your illegal friend...

Proxtube stoped working some months ago so i deinstalled it. Now its working again, thanks for the hint.
Awesome! But you might have added a couple of shots of the old KSC, or KSC2 maybe.

Frankly I'm surprised YouTube hasn't pulled it in the US yet, considering it has music owned by a major label.

Yep, wouldn't be surprised if a take-down comes soon. I'm surprised so many people use copyrighted music in their videos, when there is such a wealth of royalty-free or public domain music out there that isn't bad at all...

I am failing to see how this is a "1.0 trailer" instead of a 0.24.2 trailer :S

Am i missing something?

I am failing to see how this is a "1.0 trailer" instead of a 0.24.2 trailer :S

Am i missing something?

No it was just badly named. I would've liked that video if it didn't have such a misleading name. I thought it would've used a lot of mods and put city's and forest, biomes and what not with editing, but nope.
Supposed to be KSP 1.0 and there are not even any clouds...
YouTube says the video is not available on mobile. This makes me sad. Please don't feature videos with such restrictions.

<iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/NimK4pFG7eg" width="420"></iframe>

Everyone wants to rule the world, indeed. Simiel Black takes a peek into the future and offers up his interpretation of a KSP 1.0 trailer might look like in this weekÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s featured video.

Watching that video reminded me of the movie Promithius and Alien Vs. Predator.
Realize that it's a play on this video; hence the music choice and scene layouts:
My next video in the Machinematics series went up last night...

Would have been 10Ã¢Ë†Å¾ times better if it included the original version of "Everybody Wants To Rule The World," by Tears for Fears. Then again, I think Lorde's version fits the tone here better. No offense intended, haha, it's just that Tears for Fears's song is literally my favorite song

Nonetheless, the video is still cool. I really enjoyed the cinematic aspects.

Edited October 5, 2014 by Woopert
this should be the official ksp 1.0 trailer!!!!
